text:
Diagram | Montreal | Full-Time, Onsite | https://diagram.ca/

Diagram is a launchpad for exciting ventures in insurance, financial services, and healthcare.

Weâ€™re looking for software engineers to join our newest venture lead by a founding team of seasoned entrepreneurs.

We are looking for someone who is motivated by the challenge of joining a startup at its very beginning and who is looking to prove they can build a scalable platform from the ground up.

Our team is small for now and everyone who joins the team will have a chance to contribute in very meaningful ways to our success.

Tech Stack: React, Redux, Flow codebase, Go.

To learn more about the role and apply: https://jobs.lever.co/diagram/90bbf4be-0cd4-469a-8715-d10035...
